channel.title: [More Staff] Suggestion
channel.description:
Sorry to say, but I beleive there should be just Moparisthebest Staff, because when G-Mods are not on who else is going to moderate it?
I suggest that because it came accross my mind, and I mean people who are very active on this side of the forums?
Lock if you want, please do not flame.
BTW I was thinking that some Community Members should be some.

item.title: [More Staff] Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

[quote=“MastrChief, post:94, topic:149747”]Making that assumption is stupid. Just because he makes a suggestion that he thinks will benefit the community does not me he is just in it to put his greedy plan into action.[/quote]if only mopar had your wisdom

Read full topic

item.title: [More Staff] Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

frank_:

i dont believe we need more staff, i believe we need better staff

Yes, i vote frank for staff!

item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:98, topic:149747”][quote author=dragonus18 link=topic=205157.msg1817461#msg1817461 date=1192172118]

you only want more staff because you wish you were a staff trust me we all do deep inside but deal with it not everyone gets that spot there is tons of people in these forums wait your turn…
[/quote]Many members of this forum stereotype the staff as, for lack of a better phrase, “ignorant fools”. Does anyone really want that label?

i sterotype them as rednecks, like me.

Wow you’re the first person to ever con that one off, real original, you think of it yourself?[/quote]
no, i got help.

item.title: [More Staff] Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

You raise an interesting point, Taharok, But I agree more staff is just likely to lead to conflicts between moderators/staff.

Read full topic

item.title: [More Staff] Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Can some of you start declaring what you are meaning by the word ‘active’. Most of you are just talk, considering almost every staff member has posted in this topic already, even though you judge several of them inactive.

I don’t see what more staff will do for the site. Moparisthebest has always really been at a standstill in spam. MoparScape is getting a lot better and is staying that way. If you want a better and cleaner forum than this site, then you are wanting the impossible. You could have a hundred staff members, and these forums would still look the way they are. Large staff can just cause clutter and more issues anyway. I think that the current Global Mods and Admins are just fine the way they are.

Read full topic

item.title: [More Staff] Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Give inactives the ex-staff award and be done with. Then get some new high callibre and energetic youths to fill the golden oldies positions.

Read full topic

item.title: [More Staff] Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @i_own_i1 i--own--i
item.description:
@i_own_i1 wrote:

Frell:

Community members should be able to lock & delete there own topics. Incase anything happens on their thread, they have been a member long enough and know what to do.

I think they already can ? Not sure though if they can’t they definetly should and Veterans also.

Read full topic

item.title: [More Staff] Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

I didn’t say loose their positions, I said temporarily be ejected.

Why? they earned that position, they are not given that position just to moderate the forums, they was given it because they deserve it.
I’m pretty sure if you was given global moderator but then had to go away for a few months for whatever reason and you come back seeing that you had been de-modded, but was still offered that position if you wanted it, it would not make you feel very welcome :P.

Read full topic

I personally think Bebe and Freddy should be temporarily demodded[…]when Bebe and Freddy become more active they can return as Global Mods.

item.title: [More Staff] Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Bobdole has already said he will be inactive for a long while, why should he work an online community around his real life, life comes before an online community, same with the others.

They should only loose their positions if they are online, but don’t do much moderating or whatever.

Read full topic

item.title: [More Staff] Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

I myself have been warned by Bob, so he does do his job, but he’s a Site administrator, he should be active in all areas of the site. He was put there to administrate am I right? If he’d be active in other areas than just MoparScape, we might not need to have these topics? Same with the Global Mods, they were put in place to Moderate, adn they should do their job, otherwise face consequences.

the forums are big, get used to it. and theres a report to moderator button for a reason.

Read full topic

item.title: [More Staff] Suggestion
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

I personally think Bebe and Freddy should be temporarily demodded, and two other people put in their place, and if the Global mods put in their place do well, they can remain Global mod, and when Bebe and Freddy become more active they can return as Global Mods. I also think bobDole should be removed from admin, at least temporarily.

i second the whole bebe n freddy thing but bob is very active on the moparscape forums i always see people saying he muted them and so forth, but yeah, bebe and freddy i haven’t seen do anyhting in awhile.

Read full topic
